Author: iampieman
Text: I didn’t eat sugar (well, added sugar. I still ate fruit occasionally) from July-December, then on Christmas I let myself eat chocolate and I’ve been craving and eating it ever since smh

Author: sladkimoloko
Text: i feel this so hard ... one little morsel of sugar sends me into absolute overdrive. last year, i had a rough patch that lasted 3-4 months where i’d drop everything i was doing to drive to a grocery store or gas station to get a whole pack of cookies or bars of chocolate or bags of assorted halloween candies. man, it sucks. i gave up sugar cold turkey and i am so addicted to it that my life feels bleak and pointless now. what is life if i’m not scarfing sweets the whole time...
